name: Bulls and Cows (Vladislav)
description:
This is my first commercial game.

The game will be interesting for people who want to develop logical thinking with puzzle games. 

The game is translated into 4 languages: English, Spanish, Turkish and Russian.

There are 3 modes in the game. Choose your favorite one: Classic mode, Move limit Mode (you only have 15 attempts), Time limit Mode (exactly 500 seconds). 

Instead of simple numbers, bright balls, pleasant sounds and nice design. 

Rules:

Four digits (0,1,2,...9) are conceived. 

The player makes moves to learn these numbers and their order. 

The "0" number CAN come first!

Each move consists of four different digits.

 To make a move, you need to drag the ball with the right number to the desired position and confirm the shipment using the button "Confirm". 

If you entered something incorrectly, you can clear the sending field by clicking the "Clear" button. 

The answer is the number of figures in their places (number of bulls) and the number of figures in the wrong places (number of cows). 

The story shows which combinations have been sent earlier. If you cannot guess the number, you can use the prompt button. 

Winning if the specific numbers are correctly guessed. In non-classic mode, you can lose if you run out of moves or time has expired. 

The store buys hints and new modes.

Just drag a ball!

Try to reach 1st place!
